subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Uruguay was favored to win Group D, but after losing in the opener to Costa Rica, the team looked like it was buried and would need its own Houdini to escape. Enter the brilliant but mercurial Luis Suárez.
snippet: Uruguay was favored to win Group D, but after losing in the opener to Costa Rica, the team looked like it was buried and would need its own Houdini to escape. Enter the brilliant but mercurial Luis Suárez.
